description: As of libvirt 1.2.9, the maximum downtime for a live migration is tunable during a migration, so it doesn't require any threading foolishness. We should make this configurable in nova.conf so that large instances can be migrated across relatively smaller network pipes.
title: Allow setting max downtime for libvirt live migrations
